categories: Category:Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Steel Talon was a Star Destroyer of the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. It was commanded by Admiral Conan Antonio Motti, a member of the Imperial Joint Chiefs, prior to his death in 0 BBY.

The Steel Talon was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 reference book Ultimate Star Wars. The ship originally appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity, in Michael Reaves and Steve Perry's 2007 novel Death Star.
